General.Name: Manas Enerji Yonetimi Sanayi & Ticaret AS
General.Description: Manas Enerji Yonetimi Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi develops smart metering systems and solutions in Turkey. The company offers electro-controlled gas, water, heat, and electricity meters for municipalities, water administrations, and gas and electricity distribution companies as well as private and public institutions. It also provides gas regulators and communication products, as well as software solutions. In addition, the company offers information systems, programming, and software and consultancy services to defense industry sector. Manas Enerji Yonetimi Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1997 and is based in Sincan, Turkey.
General.Address: ASO 1. OSB Anadolu Caddesi No: 25, Sincan, Turkey, 06935
